name: Golbat
flavorText:
Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

previous.name: Zubat
previous.flavorText:
Forms colonies in
perpetually dark
places. Uses ultrasonic waves
to identify and
approach targets.

next.name: Oddish
next.flavorText:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.

pokemon.name: Crobat
pokemon.flavorText:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.
